title: K-201b v2 - Hot Streak Fixed & Award Restructure
changes: FIXED: Hot Streak now shows manager names correctly (was still showing 'Unknown' in v4.7.5)

REMOVED: Fun section completely (Phoenix, Underachiever, Wildcard) - FPL overall rank not meaningful for H2H leagues

NEW AWARD: Worst GW Rank - shows worst FPL overall GW rank achieved

Streak tracking algorithm iterates GW-by-GW to find longest consecutive runs
